about_the_game:
Survivor is an intense wave-based first-person shooter (FPS) survival game that throws you into a post-apocalyptic arena overrun by the undead. You are tasked with fighting hordes of zombies to stay alive, whether as a single player or as part of a multiplayer co-op team with your friends.

The game gets increasingly difficult to play as the zombies grow in number, speed, and strength. You'll have to develop a strategy and constantly be on the move to avoid getting overwhelmed. Fortunately, you'll have brief free moments between rounds to restock on ammo and catch your breath.

Experience a realistic shooting simulation with features such as weapon physics, recoil, projectile spread, damage falloff, aiming down sights, and a wide range of gun customization and accessories.

There are no victory conditions in Survivor, just a relentless and violent combat for survival against an endless horde of flesh-eating monsters. How long can you last before you succumb to the zombie apocalypse?
